nodes.text: A Gorskin was a type of giant sea turtle that lived on the moon Dorumaa.
Gorskins were covered in plates and had bony heads. They looked vaguely similar to the kilassin of the planet Cularin, which led some anthropologists to believe that the two species were related.
Gorskins were first mentioned in the Living Force Campaign Guide, where they were referred to as "Giant sea turtles."
